title: Foundations of this site
content:
This site started as a static HTML file with a few PHP includes. No frameworks, no build steps just markup, styles, and a single SQLite file for persistence.

Keeping it minimal let me iterate quickly. If I wanted a guestbook, I wrote one. If I needed a counter, I added it. The stack stayed understandable and portable.

Those foundations still hold: simple code, small files, and zero dependencies on heavy services.
